description.value:
Prerequisites master in Perception

Your battle insights make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents. You don’t need to succeed at a flat check to target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} creatures.

You’re not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to creatures that are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you (unless you’re flat-footed to them for reasons other than the hidden condition), and you need only a successful DC 5 flat check to target a hidden creature.

While you’re adjacent to an @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creature of your level or lower, it is instead only hidden from you.
